result.reason: VNC keyboard input issues (stuck modifiers or key mapping failures) are a known usability bug in the VNC protocol layer that affects basic remote control functionality.
result.approach: Investigate VNC keyboard event handling in ProtocolVNC.cs; check for stuck modifier keys (Ctrl/Alt/Shift not released on focus loss) and ensure SendKeyEvent calls are properly flushed; add focus-lost handler to release all modifier keys.
